participant_1.background:
I make sure my family is well-provided for, even though I'm not very tall.
i m an only child.
my favorite band is the beastie boys.
i am enrolled in several college credit courses.
I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.

participant_2.background:
I was a model for a few years before I decided to dedicate my life to protecting the environment.
I am not a homeowner, but I do love the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
favorite band is the beetles.
my husband is an author and we have twins together.
My wife is a teacher and my kids are in school.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
So far so good! I just got my coffee and I'm ready to start my day. What about you?
Good! I'm just getting ready for work. I'm a teacher and I have a full day of lessons ahead of me.
Oh that sounds exciting! I love the idea of teaching kids. Do you teach at a public school?
No, I teach at a private school. I love the environment there and the kids are great.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is the Beastie Boys. They're so unique and their music is always so fun to listen to.
I love the Beastie Boys! I used to listen to them all the time when I was younger.
Me too! They're one of the best bands ever.
I agree! I'm glad to meet someone else who likes them.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who has good taste in music.
Definitely! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to read and I'm also a big fan of cooking.
Oh that's cool! I love to cook too. What's your favorite dish to make?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm not very good at it, but I love trying new recipes.
That sounds fun! I'm not very good at cooking either, but I still love to do it.
Me too! It's always a fun challenge to try and make something delicious.
